text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Greetings! This is where the trophies 
you've acquired from races 
are displayed!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Proposition! I want you to win 
every race and fill this room 
with prizes!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Dream big! Don't stop until all the 
trophies are yours!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I want to see this place absolutely crammed wall-to-wall with glimmering trophies!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Of course! I wish for the success 
of all our Umamusume here at 
Tracen Academy as well.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Incidentally, accruing many trophies 
brings more rewards. So be sure 
to check your missions often!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
For my dream and the future of our 
Umamusume, I'm counting on you!
